data.title: So this is where they're hiding great deli in So FL
data.text:
I'm hooked on their Roast Beef.  Very good Matzo Ball soup as well.

I don't know what meat brand they use but the Roast Beef is flavorful and truly medium-rare which is how I like it  cooked.  They place an ample portion on the bread which is placed level all the way across the bread.  No disingenuous "front-stacking" here. 

The matzoh ball itself was big, firm,  flavorful and not soggy.  The broth was tasty and there were many small chunks of chicken in it.  It wasn't a Masterpiece,  just a very satisfying and filling first course. 

I prefer to eat this excellent food elsewhere as the small dining area has tables too close to one another reducing privacy past the point of no return. 

If you like deli, you gotta go here.

data.title: Outgageous-- the "real deal"...and I'm from Jersey...
data.text: Had the Pastrami/ Corned Beef on toasted rye....outstanding! I'm from Jersey and have had some great Pastrami/ Corned Beef-- this Is right there with the best of them!

data.title: Best pastrami south of New York
data.text: Hard to find good pastrami & corned beef in Florida.  This is the spot!!  Takes you back the authentic New York deli taste.  Great service.  My recommendation is to split the sandwich.  Very large and hence the price point (pricey).  Also very limited seating.  The food is five plus stars though!!!!

data.title: Great Sandwiches and Bagels
data.text:
Been there with friends, we were a party of 6.

Food was ready within 10 mins, tasting amazing. We had all different meals, everyone was satisfied.

Restaurant is a basic one....no nice furniture.

data.title: HUGE ITALIAN GRINDER
data.text:
drove by many times and notice a large crowd before, during and well after lunch, so i dropped by. WOW, talk about a NEW YORK DELI IN FLORIDA, this is it!!! have ordered the italian bird sub six times, each time i requested NO hot peppers, each time i got hot peppers. it kind of became a game, lets see if they get it right, nope! its made how they want to make it, i guess. whats funny, i now enjoy the MONSTER sub with HOT peppers and if or when i don't get them, i'll most likely miss them!!  the corn beef, OMG!!!  even the fresh pickles are unreal, as well as all the sides!!! GREAT FOOD, EVERY BIT OF IT!! OMG-THE CORN BEEF!!!
the beef tongue was a bit scary, but to each his own.  understand they deli bombs arte piled high with the goodies, the italian grinder is well over 2" thick with MEAT, if you got blocked arteries, the deli bombs will clear things up i a hurry!! GO NOW!

data.title: Huge!!!!
data.text: Pickle Barrell is to die for. My wife ordered a pastrami / corned beef sandwich and I ordered a chicken salad sandwich. Pastrami / corned beef was so big n tasty she couldn't get her hands around half the sandwich. The chicken salad was also amazing, Both sandwiches had great taste and portions were huge. Best deli sandwich I ever had. No exaggeration or BS, This place rocks!!!! Sauerkraut was the topper.

data.title: Sandwiches
data.text: Great big Philly cheese steak! Extra cheese delicious! 2 meals in one big sandwich! This place is so consistent with their food! It's been here for  40 yrs...love it! Hats off to Josh! Any sandwich I've ordered is outstanding!

data.title: Like the corned beef.
data.text:
Large sandwiches. Good for take out, delivery or eat in. Our guests always want pickle barrel corned beef sandwiches when they visit. The bread is excellent. I don't think the bread has preservatives. 

Sign up for email club to get free chips and soda weekdays with your sandwich.

data.title: Lots of Meat
data.text: The Pickle Barrell has good pickles but the true draw is the huge sandwiches.  It's a quaint place sitting on Hillsboro.  A family favorite for years.  The best Ruben!  I am not crazy about the potato or pasta salad, but I am completely satisfied with half sour pickles & one of their wonderful sandwiches.  A regular size is plenty to share or have later for leftovers.

data.title: Awesome spot
data.text:
It's been a while since last visit and food did not changed. Pickles to die for !! 
Ruben or other sandwich layered with half pound of meat!!!  
Small joint, luck has lines but worth the wait!!

data.title: Great Deli
data.text: Tasty big deli sandwiches and much more.  Side dishes were also very good.  Informal seating and eat in or take out. Parking was not easy

data.title: Wow! What a sandwich!
data.text: My wife and I enjoyed an outstanding lunch today at the Pickle Barrel. We both had the pastrami sandwich on rye bread with excellent spicy brown mustard. It was the best pastrami sandwich I ever had! I struggled to finish to finish mine as it was enormous! My wife could only get thru half but that made for a great take home. The sandwiches are served with a handful of pickles and.....you cannot beat this place. I will return....very soon!

data.title: Excellent sandwiches
data.text: Excellent Sandwiches, very meaty.Service is friendly and accurate.  Even when there are long lines the order is taken accurately and prices are reasonable.  Dont miss this little shop,

data.title: So good
data.text: We each ordered a corned beef sandwich and it cost us 25.00. We thought it was a bit steep for 2 but when we got them it was so worth it!!! I have never had the sour pickles they serve with the sandwich and they were delicious! Very busy at lunch time so you have to stand in line but well worth the wait( but not a long wait).

data.title: big, big, and bigger!
data.text:
oh my gosh, $50.00 for 3 sandwiches! but,boy was it good, it was awesome!  the best
corn beef i ever had!  The sandwiches were big enough to share. or eat it all yourself and
you don't have to eat for the rest of the day!

data.title: Mediocre at best
data.text:
Rye bread and lots of corn beef,  Nothing outstanding, not even the pickles. They say they are open until  6PM , but we got there before 5:30 and they said the dining room?
was closed. We could order to go .  They said they walkout the door at 6. We chose to stay rather than eat in our car, and we barely finished on time, but they were less than cordial. And thet are overpriced.

data.title: Awesome Sandwiches
data.text: The sandwiches are big enough that you can share! (or eat yourself!) Lunch time is a bit crowded and stand in line. (proof that it is good!)

data.title: Best Sandwiches Around!!
data.text: Once again, The Pickle Barrel doesn't disappoint!! I have been going to this little sandwich shop for over 25 years and I swear the sandwiches have only gotten better!! My favorite is The Rachel, which is the most delicious pastrami, piled sky high on the best rye bread!! I honestly can only eat half at a sitting, it's so big. And their pickles are out of this world, and you can buy extra to take home!! I stop in anytime I am on east Hillsboro Blvd. People are nice, food is excellent, whats not to love? A definite stop in Deerfield Beach!!

data.title: Quality vs Quantity
data.text: Large sandwich but lacking  in quality.  Prices way out of line.  Bread not up to deli standards.   Would like smaller sandwich at lower cost.

data.title: Absolutely delicious sandwich!
data.text: Based on all the good reviews on TA, my husband & I stopped here for lunch. We beat the crowd-understandable-that formed while we savoured our regular corned beef sandwich, big enough for sharing. Delicious pickles, too.
